definition.de: Aktivitäten zum Vergnügen, zur Entspannung und Erholung, außerhalb von bezahlter Arbeit, inklusive Essen und Reisen
definition.dk: Aktiviteter, der udføres til glæde, afslapning eller rekreation uden for lønnet beskæftigelse, herunder spisning og rejse.
definition.en-GB: Activities undertaken for pleasure, relaxation or recreation outside paid employment, including eating and travel.
definition.en-US: Activities undertaken for pleasure, relaxation or recreation outside paid employment, including eating and travel.
definition.pt-BR: Atividades realizadas por prazer, para relaxamento ou divertimento, fora do emprego, incluindo comer e viajar.
definition.pt-PT: Atividades realizadas por prazer, para relaxamento ou divertimento, fora do emprego, incluindo comer e viajar.
definition.se: Aktiviteter ägnade att ge njutning, avslappning, rekreation utanför betald arbetstid, inklusive mat och resor. Spel, tips och lotterier, gastronomi, hobbyer, semester, turism.
definition.zh-Hans: 从事有偿工作以外的娱乐、放松或娱乐活动

prefLabel.es: Estilo de vida y tiempo libre
